Package Main.businessLogic

Class adminQueries

  • java.lang.Object
    • Main.businessLogic.adminQueries
  • public class adminQueries
extends java.lang.Object
    The adminQueries class provides a set of static methods for querying and managing data related to players, characters, and guilds within the application. It interacts with the database to retrieve and update information.

      adminQueries()

      • getUsersList

        public static javax.swing.JList<java.lang.String> getUsersList​(java.sql.Connection conn)
        Retrieves a list of users from the database and returns it as a JList.
        Parameters:
        conn - the connection to the database
        Returns:
        a JList containing the names of the users, or null if no users are found
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the connection is null

        playerName - the name of the player whose characters are to be listed
        conn - the connection to the database

        Returns:
